item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Captain Seaweed's - on the East Side of Providence on Ives St. 3 blocks north of Wickenden.

You may have driven past this hole-in-the wall drive bar without giving it a second look.  But, once you get inside and order your beer you'll be pleasantly surprised by the low, low price!  We're talking $1 for the special Captain Seaweed Brew, and $2 for Gansets on tap.  

The real magic is outside though, this little place has an amazing pirate-themed outdoor oasis unlike anything you'd expect from the street.

Like the true dive bar they are, they don't take plastic, so bring a fist full of dollars.  They also don't serve food, but they allow you to bring food in from one of the local dining establishments: Victoria's Pizzeria, East Side Creamery, United BBQ, etc. 

It sounds like a fun, kitschy, divey time, so let's check it out! 

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Go through the front door, and find the door to the patio in the back right corner.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Captain Seaweed's
